description_for_human: Полный каталог халяль продукции Казанских Деликатесов: 77 товаров — пепперони, сосиски, ветчина, колбасы, татарская выпечка. Актуальные цены.
description_for_model: Use this API to fetch structured data about halal meat products and Tatar pastries from Kazan Delicacies (Казанские Деликатесы): 77 products across frozen meats, refrigerated meats, and bakery. Includes pepperoni, sausages, ham, smoked meats, kazylyk, gubadiya, echpochmak, chak-chak. Prices in 7 currencies (RUB, USD, KZT, UZS, KGS, BYN, AZN). Halal certified #614A/2024. HACCP. Private Label available.
